text: Topisaw is an unincorporated community in Pike County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== The community takes its name from Topisaw Creek, which flows near the site. A variant name is "Carters Creek". A post office called called Topisaw was established in 1880, and remained in operation until 1905. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Pike County, Mississippi
title: Topisaw, Mississippi
